column3: Latest;Kandal: The Immigration General Department said that on June 29
column6: a foreigner burned himself at National Road No 6
column12: took some gasoline and for no apparent reason
column13: set himself alight.------People intervened to put out the flames
column14: and the man was sent to Calmette Hospital in Phnom Penh. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/88766------EDIT: We later got news he had died.
